content:
Hello there!
During a Dataverse Sustainability WG preparatory meeting we discussed that a space to communicate about the open calls, cascading grants etc. we know of and that could be helpful for dataverse installations could be of use for the community as community members might then encounter more ways of financing their (hopefuly related to Dataverse's improvement ) projects.

What do you think? Should such a channel be made, or maybe we should just share interesting Open Calls etc. we notice in #community?
I don't mind having a new channel here in Zulip for this. What would you like to call it?
Is "&" allowed in names, if so I think that `grants-&-open-calls" would work fine. I'd be happy to hear any other suggestions to improve it afterwards though :)

Hmm, I was kinda hoping you'd say just #grants :grinning:

Shorter and sweeter :candy:
I'm fine with grants too :smile:
Frenchmen always use more words :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:
Thanks for creating the channel! :smile:
I'd like you to be able to set the description. I haven't figured out Zulip permissions very well yet. :thinking:
@Dimitri Szabo I just promoted you from "member" to "administrator". Please try setting the description for #grants if you can.
It worked fine, thanks :smiley:
Awesome. New sheriff in town. :cowboy: :star:
